name: Square Escape
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD: Move
Space: Start Game

Color Escape is the sequel to the critically acclaimed game "Color Collider." In this big ole adventure, play as a square escaping the facility. Go through randomized levels for as long as you can before you eventually have to restart!

THEME: Surprise
HOW IT FITS: The game constantly surprises the player by throwing randomized levels at them. The player has to quickly adapt to finish within the time limit.

CREDITS:

Rami - Programmer

Sariza - Game Designer

Curryrice - Music/Sound Design

Meesh - Graphic Design
